title: Call of Juarez
notes: Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
publisher: Ubisoft Entertainment, Ascaron Entertainment, Techland, Focus Entertainment
description: Call of Juarez is an epic adventure western themed FPS game. The player alternately assumes the roles of two distinct, antagonistic characters: a sneaking fugitive Billy and his hunter the reverend Ray. Apart from the highly interesting, emotional and psychological aspect of the link between the two
